程序包 org.apache.jmeter.util

类 SlowSocket

java.lang.Object
java.net.Socket
org.apache.jmeter.util.SlowSocket
所有已实现的接口:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class SlowSocket extends Socket
"Slow" (non-SSL) socket implementation to emulate dial-up modems etc

  • 构造器概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SlowSocket

      public SlowSocket(int cps, String host, int port, InetAddress localAddress, int localPort, int timeout) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • SlowSocket

      public SlowSocket(int cps, String host, int port, InetAddress localAddr, int localPort) throws IOException
      参数:
      cps - characters per second
      host - hostname
      port - port
      localAddr - local address
      localPort - local port
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during initialization
      IllegalArgumentException - if cps <= 0, or if the port or localPort values lie outside of the allowed range between 0 and 65535

    • SlowSocket

      public SlowSocket(int cps, String host, int port) throws UnknownHostException, IOException
      参数:
      cps - characters per second
      host - hostname
      port - port
      抛出:
      UnknownHostException - if the name of the host can not be determined automatically
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during initialization
      IllegalArgumentException - if cps <= 0, or if the port or localPort values lie outside of the allowed range between 0 and 65535

    • SlowSocket

      public SlowSocket(int cps)
      Added for use by SlowHC4SocketFactory.
      参数:
      cps - characters per second
